Identities.Title: Title of the identity - name of the power or team or whatever makes sense
second identity, if there is one.

Name of card.text: Text of card goes here. Start of turn, end of turn, powers, and on entry effects go in their own property

Another card.on entry: Anything that happens on entry should go here.
Another card.start of turn: Anything that happens at the start of a turn goes here. Start with "At the start of your turn, "
Another card.on destroy: What happens when this card is destroyed
Another card.end of turn: Anything that happens at the end of a turn goes here. Start with "At the end of your turn, "

modifiers.text: If a card adds a modifier, denote that here. If it reduces damage, set color to 'Green'. If it increases damage, 'Yellow' (follow tile colors as much as possible)
These need not match word for word, just enough for me to know what's going on.
